data.title: Al Pacino Takes on Shakespeare in "Looking for Richard"
data.meta_description: Pacino talks with Terry Gross about his new movie "Looking for Richard." He directed, produced and stars in this experimental film. It takes us behind the scenes of a production of Shakespeare's Richard the Third, and features Winona Ryder, Alec Baldwin, Vanessa Redgrave and Kenneth Branagh. Pacino currently stars in the Broadway production "Hughie" by Eugene O'Neil.
data.meta_site_name: Fresh Air Archive: Interviews with Terry Gross
